00107 
00120 int cache_content_init( cache_content_client_parameter_t param, cache_content_status_t *pstatus )
00121 {
00122   /* Try to create the cache directory */
00123   if( mkdir( param.cache_dir, 0750 ) != 0 && errno != EEXIST )
00124     {
00125       /* Cannot create the directory for caching data */
00126       fprintf( stderr, "Can't create cache dir = %s, error = ( %d, %s )\n", 
00127                param.cache_dir, errno, strerror( errno ) ) ;
00128 
00129       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00130       return -1 ;
00131     }
00132   
00133 
00134   /* Successfull exit */
00135   return 0 ;
00136 } /* cache_content_init */
00137 
00148 int cache_content_init_dir( cache_content_client_parameter_t param, unsigned short export_id )
00149 {
00150   char path_to_dir[MAXPATHLEN] ;
00151   
00152   snprintf( path_to_dir, MAXPATHLEN, "%s/export_id=%d", param.cache_dir, 0 ) ;
00153   
00154   if( mkdir( path_to_dir, 0750 ) != 0 && errno != EEXIST )
00155     {
00156       return -1 ;
00157     }
00158 
00159   return 0 ;
00160 } /* cache_content_init_dir */
00161 
00174 int cache_content_client_init( cache_content_client_t           * pclient,
00175                                cache_content_client_parameter_t   param )
00176 {
00177   LRU_status_t lru_status ;
00178 
00179   pclient->log_outputs         = param.log_outputs ;
00180   pclient->nb_prealloc         = param.nb_prealloc_entry ;
00181   pclient->flush_force_fsal    = param.flush_force_fsal ;
00182   pclient->max_fd_per_thread   = param.max_fd_per_thread ;
00183   pclient->retention           = param.retention ;
00184   pclient->use_cache           = param.use_cache ;
00185   strncpy( pclient->cache_dir, param.cache_dir, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00186 
00187 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00188   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00189   BuddySetDebugLabel( "cache_content_entry_t" ) ;
00190 #endif
00191 
00192 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00193   STUFF_PREALLOC( pclient->pool_entry,
00194                   pclient->nb_prealloc,
00195                   cache_content_entry_t,
00196                   next_alloc ) ;
00197 
00198 # ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00199     /* For debugging memory leaks */
00200     BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00201 # endif
00202 
00203   if( pclient->pool_entry == NULL )
00204     {
00205       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Error : can't init data_cache client entry pool" ) ;
00206       return 1 ;
00207     }
00208 #endif
00209 
00210   if( ( pclient->lru_gc = LRU_Init( param.lru_param, &lru_status ) ) == NULL ) 
00211     {
00212        DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Error: can't init data_cache client lru gc" ) ;
00213        return 1 ;
00214     }
00215   /* Successfull exit */
00216   return 0 ;
00217 } /* cache_content_init */
